NutMEG.culture.organism package¶

Submodules¶

NutMEG.culture.organism.organism module¶

class NutMEG.culture.organism.organism.organism(name, locale, metabolism, maintenance=None, CHNOPS=None, mass=1e-16, E_synth=None, volume=1e-18)¶

Bases: NutMEG.culture.base_organism.base_organism.base_organism

Class for an individual organism, which grows and splits independently.

take_step_lite(t)¶

Increment the organism’s life by time t.

Updates the organism’s parameters based on its mortality, environment, metabolism, etc.
